function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of familiarity with campus buildings and keys may lead to increased contact and exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential risk of virus spread and increased transmission among faculty and students.","Mitigation":"Provide detailed guidance on building access and key usage, support remote work options, and implement touchless entry systems.","Technologies":"Touchless entry systems, remote work tools, building access and key management software.","People":"Faculty, students, campus law enforcement.","Owner":"Campus administration, facilities management, campus law enforcement."},{"Description":"Lack of proactive interaction with students may result in missed opportunities to identify and address health concerns or symptoms of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Risk of delayed intervention and potential for disease spread among the student population.","Mitigation":"Encourage proactive engagement with students, provide health education and resources, and implement wellness checks and monitoring systems.","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, student engagement platforms, wellness tracking software.","People":"Students, campus law enforcement, university staff.","Owner":"Campus administration, health services, campus law enforcement."},{"Description":"Failure to act as representatives of the university may lead to missed opportunities to enforce health and safety measures and educate the campus community on disease prevention.","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance with health guidelines and higher potential for disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Provide training on health and safety protocols, actively engage in campus outreach and education, and enforce compliance with public health measures.","Technologies":"Online training platforms, communication tools, compliance monitoring software.","People":"Campus law enforcement, students, university staff.","Owner":"Campus administration, campus law enforcement, university communications and outreach."}]}
